data.name: 12 Labours of Hercules XII: Timeless Adventure
data.detailed_description:
New time-management strategy game! Think strategically, manage resources and travel to new locations!
One sunny day brave Hercules was resting in his hammock and cooking delicious donuts. He dozed off just for a few minutes but it was enough for the hero's brunch to burn to a crisp. All the dreams of starving Hercules were ruined. What should he do? There was a way! Hercules decided to turn back time, and move the clock’s hand back with all his might! What could possibly go wrong? Obviously, everything!



Now time is broken and going to destroy the whole world. Besides, Chronos—mighty god of time—is enraged and wants to punish Hercules. He prepared for the hero lots of tricky traps, threats, and challenges. Will strong Hercules be able to avoid the dangers, repair the clock and save the world from time disaster? Play “12 Labours of Hercules XII: Timeless Adventure”, and find it out!



Together with Hercules you will take a trip through Ancient Greece, Hades’ underworld and Poseidon’s underwater kingdoms, face Chronos, Golem and other amazing creatures. And let the adventures never end!



  • Accompany Hercules during his time labour!
  • Terrific Time Management.
  • Three modes of difficulty.
  • Fascinating and different tasks on each level.
  • Play 56 thrilling levels.
  • Explore sublevels, bonus levels and super bonus levels.
  • Easy to learn, hard to master: many ways to complete a level.

data.short_description: Help Hercules repair the clock he broke trying to turn back time, defeat Chronos and save the world from catastrophe!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Portuguese, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 resolution
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: With OpenAL support

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.8 and later
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 resolution
  • Sound Card: On board
